title: C_4 Copy
content: A **copy of C_4** in G is a set of 4 distinct vertices (a, b, c, d) forming a 4-cycle: a-b-c-d-a with all edges present. The vertices must be distinct and non-adjacent pairs (a,c) and (b,d) must differ.

title: C_4 Copies Set
content: **C4Copies(G)** is the set of all ordered 4-tuples forming 4-cycles in G. Each unlabeled C_4 corresponds to 8 labeled copies (4 rotations × 2 reflections).

title: Count C_4
content: **countC4(G)** counts the number of distinct (unlabeled) 4-cycles in G by dividing the labeled count by 8. This is the quantity the conjecture bounds.

title: Turán Number ex(n; C_4)
content: **ex(n; C_4)** is the maximum number of edges in an n-vertex graph containing no 4-cycles. This is the threshold for the supersaturation problem.

title: ex(n; C_4) Asymptotics
content: **Reiman-KST**: ex(n; C_4) = (1/2 + o(1))n^{3/2}. The lower bound comes from projective plane polarity graphs; the upper bound from Kővári-Sós-Turán.

title: Exceeds Turán
content: A graph **exceeds the Turán number** for C_4 if it has more than ex(n; C_4) edges. Such graphs must contain at least one 4-cycle.

title: Erdős Problem 60 (OPEN)
content: **Supersaturation Conjecture**: If G has > ex(n; C_4) edges, then G contains at least Ω(n^{1/2}) copies of C_4. This remains OPEN.

title: Projective Plane Order
content: **Projective plane orders** are numbers of the form n = q² + q + 1. For prime powers q, projective planes exist and yield extremal C_4-free graphs.

title: Even Projective Plane Order
content: n = q² + q + 1 for **even q**. He-Ma-Yang proved the conjecture for these special values of n.

title: He-Ma-Yang Theorem (2021)
content: **Partial Result**: For n = q² + q + 1 with q even, exceeding ex(n; C_4) forces Ω(n^{1/2}) copies of C_4. This confirms the conjecture for these specific n.

title: At Least One C_4
content: By definition of ex(n; C_4), exceeding the Turán number guarantees at least one 4-cycle. This is the trivial lower bound.

title: Two-Copies Conjecture (OPEN)
content: **Weaker Open Problem**: Even proving ≥ 2 copies of C_4 are guaranteed remains open! Erdős and Simonovits noted this remarkable gap in knowledge.

title: Erdős-Simonovits Supersaturation
content: **General Supersaturation**: Exceeding ex(n; H) by a constant factor (1+ε) forces a positive density of H-copies. This gives some bound but weaker than Ω(n^{1/2}).

title: Polarity Graph Existence
content: **Extremal Construction**: For prime power q, the polarity graph of PG(2,q) is C_4-free with exactly ex(n; C_4) edges for n = q² + q + 1.

title: Partial Result for Even q
content: For any even q, n = q² + q + 1 is a valid projective plane order for which He-Ma-Yang applies.
